data.text: @JemNicoleRN @ESNEFT Are you still pretending to be a nurse 😂😂🤣
@ESNEFT @JemNicoleRN you read the PFizer clinical trial data https://t.co/TmmONwyZEt

@ESNEFT @JemNicoleRN You advise on being vaccinated on what grounds considering over 1000 triple jabbed are still dying weekly 250 double jabbed also dying v 125 unvaccinated not to mention 600,000 cases triple jabbed latest data v 70,000 unjabbed over 18s https://t.co/TmmONwyZEt

@Jill93837534 @tessyursine @JemNicoleRN @ESNEFT Seriously, what difference does having the jab make? It makes no difference whatsoever! This just gives the green light for jabbed to visit, even though they could be positive, and spread it. It’s okay though, they’re fully jabbed.
@JemNicoleRN @ESNEFT Maybe they’re trying to put visitors off - so they will not see what has been going on in hospitals.
@JemNicoleRN @ESNEFT As an evidenced based professional myself, I'm longing to read all the research on the effectiveness of visors.....longing to see even one peer reviewed article on how they work

@ESNEFT @JemNicoleRN Good, disgusting and disgraceful! Don’t you think we have suffered enough! I have not said goodbye to loved ones because of this! My mind is tortured because of your stupid rules! The dying patient wants love, no good protecting them, when they are half dead from cancer!
@Phyllyryan @JemNicoleRN @ESNEFT @NNUH can you offer an explanation please? Have you not read the #pfizerdocuments? Have you not read the latest peer reviewed case studies on #Ivermectin?
@ESNEFT @JemNicoleRN Disgusting! These people behave like fascists
